p: Currently, the world is battling a COVID-19 pandemic caused by a novel coronavirus SARS-CoV2. This virus is responsible for at least 23,254 confirmed cases and 903 deaths in the Africa Region ( Livingston et al., 2020). At the time of writing this manuscript, there are no treatments or vaccines for COVID-19, but over 100 COVID-19 vaccines are under development for human trials ( WHO, 2020a). This pandemic has had an overwhelming effect on healthcare system worldwide, and Africa (especially Sub-Saharan Africa) may not be able to survive it. Therefore, there is a need for researchers in Africa stop this pandemic before the effects are devastating by using other research on treating viral infections with natural plants.
